sentences.sentence: Right-handers live, on average, nine years longer than lefties.
sentences.translation: 用右手的人平均寿命比左撇子要长大约9年。

sentences.sentence: It turns out that right-handed folks prefer the right and lefties prefer the left.
sentences.translation: 测试结果表明：右撇子更喜欢右边，左撇子喜欢左边。

sentences.sentence: "Righties think right is good, and lefties think left is good," Casasanto concludes.
sentences.translation: Casasanto总结说：“右撇子认为右边的好，左撇子认为左边的好”。
